attributes.description:
Here are some of what the team at Renault Pinetown offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 4 620.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 26 280.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
attributes.options: ABS, Aircon, Central Locking, Cloth Trim, Electric Windows, Metallic Paint, Airbags

attributes.description: At KIA Diepriver we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and a quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Diep River Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our Dealership.

attributes.description: Balance of 3 year / 120 000 kms Volkswagen warranty, Balance of 5 year / 90000 kms Volkswagen service plan, KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership
